description: This is the main entry point for a Flutter application that sets up theme and state management for a Tic Tac Toe game, launching the HomeScreen widget.

classes.name: TicTacToeApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app that provides theming and game state management.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes and runs the TicTacToeApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for the TicTacToeApp widget that constructs the widget tree with theming and state provider.
